About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I have been involved in active web development for 3 years, the period during which I mostly worked with Andela (a tech start-up). I am a self-motivated and self-taught professional who likes to solve problems. My repertoire includes programming languages and tools such as Python(Django, Flask), NodeJS, ReactJS with Hooks, PostgreSQL, Docker, Twitter Bootstrap, amongst others.
I have worked with a microservices-based system and efficiently integrating third-party APIs. And also built APIs using Python (Django & Flask) and NodeJS then consumed them using Javascript frameworks. I hold a Bachelor's Degree focused on Computer Engineering from Makerere University.

Andela Uganda

Full Stack Developer

- Worked remotely with team members distributed across Africa to develop to build Andela software.
- Worked closely with software development and design team members to develop robust solutions to meet client requirements for functionality, scalability, and performance.

Landville Nigeria

Full Stack Developer

- Worked remotely with team members from Uganda, Kenya and Nigeria to develop to build a real estate system for a Nigerian company Landville.

iLearn Africa

Back-End Developer

- Worked with a team of three developers in the development of the backend for a high-traffic e-learning system. We designed custom REST API microservices built in Python and NodeJS to be consumed by a frontend in ReactJS.
